column4: Strange I installed a fresh copy of Ubuntu without the upgrades and all works fine on my Inspiron 8500 minus the screen res.  Still having trouble getting my Nvidia card to display over 640x480. So decided to do the latest update and now I'm hung during login.
I know Ive seen this before in Gnome but cannot remember what it was.
maybe there's an error message in your ~/.xsession-errors?
